pkgmetadata.longdescription: spdx====A Python module incorporating an interface to the SPDX license database.This library serves purely as a holder for the database that can befound on `the SPDX website <https://spdx.org/licenses/>`__.To more easily query this database or detect licenses, consider usingsomething like`spdx-lookup <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/spdx-lookup>`__.Usage-----See the ``spdx/__init__.py`` file for the very simple interface.tl;dr: ``spdx.licenses()`` gets you the licenses, and ``spdx.License``is a nice wrapper for interacting with them.
